{"id":1315408874,"question_id":15,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1720543478,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"62 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1315408874/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"27.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n\t\tvector<vector<int>> output;\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end()); //O(nlog(n)), worst(n^2)\n\t\tfor (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++) {\n            if(((i > 0) && (nums[i] == nums[i-1])))\n                continue;\t\t\t\n\t\t\tint low = i+1;\n\t\t\tint high = nums.size()-1;\n\t\t\tint sum = 0-nums[i];\n\t\t\twhile( low < high ) {\n\t\t\t\tif( nums[low] + nums[high] == sum) {\n\t\t\t\t    output.push_back({nums[i], nums[low], nums[high]});\n\t\t\t\t\twhile(low < high && nums[low] == nums[low+1]) low++;\n\t\t\t\t\twhile(low < high && nums[high] == nums[high-1]) high--;\n\t\t\t\t\tlow++;\n\t\t\t\t\thigh--;\n\t\t\t\t} else if( nums[low] + nums[high] > sum ) {\n\t\t\t\t\thigh--;\n\t\t\t\t} else {\n\t\t\t\t\tlow++;\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t\t\t\n\t\treturn output;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
